text: i just turned off the HVAC systems because they seem to be convinced that they're cooling by blowing hot air. If it gets too cold, let us know on this channel!
HVAC turned back on, apparently there was a relay problem on the roof that has been addressed. Should see improvement now, holler on this channel if it doesn't happen!
hi friends! we have a friend coming in tonight to talk with us about personal finance at 530 in the social space - all are welcome!
